name: Rick T
text: This place fit the definition of "hole on the wall".  There's only one server so service is slow.  Strange looking calzone but it tastes alright, not bad but not exceptional neither.  Good for cheap everyday lunch.

name: Lee Melvin
text: Heckin' good pizza, but the place was completely dead. If it weren't for the open sign, I would have assumed it was closed. It was incredibly short-staffed, with only one person working the restaurant. The two help wanted signs pasted on …More

name: Morgan Carr
text: Just found this place not too long ago and go all the time now. Super cheap food, beer, and wine. Their pizza is to die for. I highly recommend checking out this pizza place. They also have trivia Tuesday night's which is super fun and you can wine store cash.

name: Jennifer Lane
text: This is my idea of a great local pizza place! The owner is so friendly and is so involved in the community! It's great chatting with him while I wait to pick up take out pizza.  He'll tell you he won't rush the pizza because if you're …More

name: Bri Mac
text: I love this pizza, but as another person reviewed on Fridays they get busy. Most days it's just a long wait but today they forgot to make my order. Now I have time to give this review. I will continue to eat here but I'm going to be sure to find somewhere else on Fridays.

name: Lauren Wolfman
text: I went into this location for a pick up delivery and I was early so I got to watch my sandwich being made. I realize pizza places have a slightly different sanitary policy to follow, or at least petitioned for one but I was still a little …More

name: Camden Bassett
text: a good pizza place with very friendly staff. could be slightly cleaner though

name: Sylvia Fly
text: The pizza was great, service was ok but the restaurant needs a good cleaning from top to bottom. Everything had layers of dust on it, long hair was stuck to the menu, brown splatter on the wall next to our table, crumbs all over tables, chairs and floor.

name: Digs Daner
text: I really enjoy the food here. The toppings are delicious, the sauce is good, and I particularly enjoy the crust--crunchy on the oustide, chewy on the inside. The staff is also pretty nice, and they've got a few arcade games in the back …More

name: Shreekant Thaker
text: Truly a great place for pizza or calzones bar none. Love this place. Ita always been consistent.

name: JustThatJacob
text: Great place. Fast service with good tasting food. I've seen the owner there most of the time, even serving food when it's busy!

name: William Freese
text: Do I have to give them a star?  Based on my last two experiences at this location, they don't deserve any.  First off, let me say I love the Johnny's chain and their pizza.  However, the last time we went here, we waited an hour before the …More

name: Barbara Hofherr
text: Love this place. No longer a part of the chain, so it's LOCAL!  It's great service staff and pizza. Love!

name: Brittany Sevener
text: Their pizza and garlic knots are absolutely amazing!!! As are the pasta dishes and wraps. I haven't ordered anything that wasn't good there. They have the same cook there everyday all day and his food is great. My family and I eat here a …More

name: Bryan Fly
text: Unfortunately we have given this location too many chances. Went to pick up our order, got there early so I decided to grab a beer while I wait. Nothing on draft, literally only 4 Budweiser bottles in the fridge... …More

name: Mike Robinson
text: Love this place. A pizza slice is huge,  More than enough for me.

name: K. Qualls
text: Johnny's pizza is delicious - the staff is friendly and they offer gluten free options for people like me!

name: Maral Tascioglu
text: The servers are very helpful and amazing. The chef knows how to make wonderful pizza and the atmosphere is very friendly. When johnny's have trivia nights, it's very fun!

name: Donald Simmons
text: Although I really like their pizza, I will no longer be a patron here. I have experienced very poor service with my delivery orders taking too long or being sent to the wrong address. I switched to picking up my orders only to be ignored by the staff while they switched TV stations for 10 minutes.

name: Milan Chokshi
text: The pizza is great. The service is awesome while all the waitress are really nice and polite. Does get at little bit busy on the weekend but still great.

name: WM Johns Creek
text: Need more servers and more ovens...the pizza is very good though! But on a fri night you'll wait a min of an hour to get your food. They seem to cater to the take out orders before the sit down customers. :(

name: Richard O.
text: Johnny Pizza as a chain is excellent. There once was a good Johnnys right across the street. I dont know if this is the same owner, but this location is a dump. Its dark and dirty. They make cheese pizzas ahead and then add toppings as …More

name: Michael Carter
text: Fantastic food and drinks and people, old school pizza joint, the way it should be

name: Eric Braswell
text:
Great food and enjoyable atmosphere!
The owner is extremely friendly and gracious.

name: Derek Weeks
text: Only one small older man working ,waiting cooking,cash register. Everything perfect and fast.

name: Rebecca Sylvain
text: I love how they don't have a delivery driver -_-

name: Harold Byrd
text: Great family spot. Good food, especially the subs and pizza and calzones and stromboli's.

name: Say Patel
text:
My family and I have been going to this specific Johnny's for over 5 years plus. Today will be the last visit. Great food.... use to be great service.
Today, my wife and I went in with 2 Groupon's. Server told us that we could not …More

name: Jp Carter
text: The Lemon Pepper wings are the best...  The BBq Chicken pizza is outstanding as well..  . Good beer'z on tap....  overall a pretty great place...

name: Mackinzie A.
text: AWESOME place. Service is good till friday.

name: Chris Allen
text: Our waitress was really nice but her service didn't match her hospitality. The pizza is better quality than typical delivery chains but it's not worth the premium you pay. The calzone was okay. They can be quite slow at times.

name: Sarah Triplett
text: This location does not have the same menu as it does on the website. 20 different types of stromboli. But only had two types. Employee on the phone was very rude, and did not try to compromise. When we decided to go with another restaurant option. They refused to hang up.

name: Dwight Evans
text: Good food and good fun with friends.

name: ken mcdaniel
text: Bought groupon for this establishment. Pizza was not done and was goohy. Gave it another  chance and went back for lunch to try their advertised .99 slice.  Failed to read in writing small enough to be braille that it was .50 for any …More

name: Ivan Akimov
text: The owner is really friendly, the food is amazing, and the wings are killer.

name: Kris Ganesh
text: Good pizza but slow service. Not sure $$ is worth the quality.

name: scott lathrop
text: Adequate. There are better places sure, but it beats Pappa John's or Domino's.

name: John Morrison
text: Excellent  Ptzza

name: John Paul Brandt
text: Most awesome veggie sub after workout

name: V
text: its alright

name: John Bryant
text: Slices are really large!

name: Deanna Kim Tower
text: Calzone is awesome!

name: LM Y
text: Husband and I ate take out both became very ill.  Beware

name: nicholle Little
text: Yummy

name: Jackeline Barros
text: Awesome!!!!!  Good songs and nice place!!!!

name: ljk106
text: WHITNEY is awesome

name: Paul Freet
text: Always a great pizza for a great price

name: Ed Caruso
text: Great crust and loved the crumbled Italian sausage!

name: Scott Hollman
text: Horrible service, the food is hit or miss mostly miss

name: Kevin MB
text: I really thought it was NY style until I tried it.
